talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Cleric Thomas${action:Talk}
Go to Marian's Shrine and find both the Sage's Staff and Vision Orb.
We're out of time so hurry!

$Cleric Jake$
(Coughs)... Huff huff...
(Jake is gasping for breath)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Which part of Marian's Shrine does the door lead to?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Cynthia${action:Talk}
Ah...Right! It is said that a door leading to Marian's Shrine was constructed a long time ago in Frost Wind Forest. Don't tell me the door still exists...
That guy could actually find that door?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
It leads to the lowest floor of Marian's Shrine. The path is narrow and old so it will not be easy to get out from there.
Head to Marian's Shrine now, you should be able to capture him before he escapes.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia${action:Talk}
You should get going.
If the Dragon Follower gets out of Marian's Shrine, he can escape Mana Ridge in the blink of an eye!

$Cleric Thomas${action:Talk}
Go to Marian's Shrine and find both the Sage's Staff and Vision Orb.
We're out of time so hurry!

$Cleric Jake$
(Coughs)... Huff huff...
(Jake is gasping for breath)

$Cleric Jake$
(Coughs) Huff huff…
It was a good fight… hah…ha…
You… are now good enough to fulfill the duites of a Templar Knight… Arrgh…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why... are you wearing a Dragon Follower's Mask? Why...?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake$
Is it weird to see that… That I'm a Dragon Follower? Hah...
(Coughs)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... You... deceived us? Did you betray us?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake$
... My mission... was to steal the Sage's Staff and Vision Orb from Mana Ridge…Though it took a little too long... Ha... (Coughs)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why... Why did you turn to the dark side? Why?!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake$
I'm sorry.. But... I have no regrets, and I don't blame anyone...
I was just doing what I had to do... You and I are on different paths... That's... That's all...

$Cleric Jake$
(Coughs)Good and Evil are... just like two sides of a coin... (Coughs)... Which side appears will be decided by the circumstances... (Coughs)... Perhaps one day... your dark side will awaken as well...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Live and repent! If you die just like that... I.. I will wipe out all Dragon Followers!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Jake$
Ugghh… There's not much time left... I couldn't fulfill my dreams, but… I hope you can achieve yours. You will be enlightened when you break free from the norms... Live a life where... you are not controlled or forced by anyone...

$Cleric Jake${action:Talk}
Ha... Ha... This ain't... too bad...
{user_nick}... My brother... We may not be related by blood... But I treated you as one of my own... The ordeal... is yet to be over. (Coughs)... I hope... you can achieve your goals...

$Cleric Jake$
(Jake smiles faintly. You hold his still body close and shout his name but he does not respond...
Your mind is in a chaotic mess with the pain from the betrayal of a trusted friend.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I got the Orb and the Staff back…<FONT size=2 face=Arial></FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Thomas$
Why... do you look so gloomy? Did you lose the Dragon Follower? W-where's the Orb and Staff...?

$Cleric Thomas${action:Talk}
You found them? Hahaha~ Great job!
Thanks to you, the reputation of us Templar Knights will only get better!
But… did something happen?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You once told me not to trust others so easily… You were worried about the pain I might get…</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Thomas${action:Talk2}
W-what do you mean...? Jake was a Dragon Follower...?
Jake who fought against the evil more than anyone…? It can't be true…

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What was the dream he tried to achieve…?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Thomas$
Jake... Argh...
(Thomas looks somber and remains quiet for a while)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Jake... What was the dream that you believed in…? For what…?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Cleric Thomas$
I don't know what Jake's goals were...
But maybe he subconciously wanted to be stopped by you...
I don't know what to say.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Defeat the Dragon Follower at Marian's Shrine
journal.contents:
Go to Marian's Shrine to track down and defeat the Dragon Follower, and recover the Sage's Staff and Vision Orb.

Blizzard Plain (Secret Path) → Marian's Shrine
journal.destination: Defeat Dragon Follower at Marian's Shrine

journal.title: Talk to the defeated Dragon Follower at Marian's Shrine
journal.contents:
Go to Marian's Shrine and defeat the Dragon Follower, and recover the Sage's Staff and Vision Orb. Talk to the defeated Dragon Follower and uncover his identity.

Blizzard Plain (Secret Path) → Marian's Shrine
journal.destination: Talk to the defeated Dragon Follower at Marian's Shrine
journal.todo_msg: Please defeat the Dragon Follower and talk to him at Marian's Shrine.

journal.title: Talk to Cleric Thomas
journal.contents:
The true identity of the Dragon Follower was Cleric Jake. Return to Mana Ridge and report to Cleric Thomas.

Mana Ridge → Cleric Thomas
